transcript:
Customer: Hello?
Executive: Hello. Hello? Hello, Akhilesh sir, main Ritika baat kar rahi hoon IndiaMART se, aapki account manager.
Customer: Ji bataiye.
Executive: Sir, aapne call kiya tha kal mere number pe? To bas usi ke regarding maine aapko call kiya, bataiye sir.
Customer: Main to call nahi kiya tha, lagta hai lag gaya hoga galti se.
Executive: Achcha, ho sakta hai. Kis number se aaya tha, mere hi number se?
Customer: Haan, ho sakta hai, kyunki sir maine aapko call kiya tha na, isliye aapne call back kiya ho us number pe.
Executive: Ho sakta hai.
Executive: Haan, koi baat nahi. Sir, main ye bol rahi thi, hamari jo services abhi chal rahi hai IndiaMART par, theek hai, wo matlab bahut hi kam use ho rahi hai kuch dino se, kya problem aa raha hai sir?
Customer: Are jab hamare accordingly jab aayega hi nahi demand to hum dhyan hi ispe kyun de?
Executive: Sir, lekin agar aisa koi problem hai, to aap ek bar time de do, main aapke sath ek video meet kar leti hoon aur usme jo bhi corrections karne honge, chahe wo mapping ko lekar ke ho, aapke keywords ko lekar ke ho, wo karte hain.
Customer: Main apne accountant se aapki meeting kara, matlab wo jo video call hai, conferencing kara dena, use samjha dijiye, wo abse sambhalega ye sab.
Executive: Sir, unka number IndiaMART pe hai?
Customer: Nahi, unka number nahi hai, mere aap mere ko video call kariye na, main na baith ke wo baith jayenge, wo samajh lenge. Main dusre sector mein is time kaam kar raha hoon na, mera isse related koi kaam nahi hai.
Executive: Achcha, achcha, theek hai. To sir, aap ye bataiye phir kab kar sakte hain?
Customer: Aaj kaun sa? Monday, Monday kiya jaaye?
Executive: Monday kiya jaaye, theek hai. Ya Friday ko, Monday ko. Sir, kyunki abhi inhe bhi kuch kaam hai, wo dusre kaam mein lage hue hain.
Customer: Koi baat nahi, hum Monday ko kar lenge, koi aisi baat nahi hai, lekin jab tak ke liye mera aapse ek chota sa request hai, sir agar aap maan sake, bas aap do-char, do-char buyleads jab tak properly use kariye. Theek hai, jaise do-teen buylead aaj use karke dekhiye, do-teen buylead kal use kariye, but please daily basis pe use kariye. Hai na, abhi hamara buylead consumption is month mein zero hai, bilkul flat zero.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Main isliye sir aapse bol rahi hoon.
Customer: Main dhyan hi nahi de raha na, isliye to zero aayega hi.
Executive: Nahi, bilkul aapki baat samajh rahi hoon, lekin please sir, mera bhi aapse request hai, please ek do, ek do buylead consume karenge na, problem kya ho raha hai sir isme shuru se jo bhi raha, jaise ab to chalo aap ye bol sakte ho ki leads nahi aa raha hai, hai na? Lekin jis mahine se services start hua, pure mahine mein chhe buylead use hui. Agar buylead wala issue hai bhi na, to aap hume batao. Hum uske liye jo bhi best ho sakega wo zarur karenge. Lekin problem kya hai ki agar aap bataoge nahi, hume khud se pata chalega nahi, to hum aapki help kaise kare, aap batao.
Customer: Nahi, nahi, sahi baat hai.
Executive: Hai na, abhi aap khud socho, pura mahina mein aaj hamara 14 tarikh ho gaya, hai na, that means ki do hafte, do hafte mein hume 34 buylead milta hai aur humne 34 mein se buylead abhi jo use kara hai wo zero kara hai. Jabki ek buylead aapke har buylead ke liye aapne humko payment kiya hai. To hum to zarur ye chahenge na ki aapko at least aap buylead consume karke dekho. Ab ho kya raha hai, na hum buylead use kar rahe hain, uske chakkar mein jo direct inquiries and calls hai na, wo bhi hamare paas nahi aa rahi hai. Kyunki buylead se hi sari cheeze linked hoti hai, direct inquiries, direct calls, agar hum buylead use nahi karenge to direct inquiries nahi aayengi, direct inquiries nahi aayengi to call nahi aayengi.
Customer: Main aapko baat karata hoon apne accountant se, use sab samjha dijiye, wahi abse sambhalega ye sab.
Executive: Haan, koi dikkat nahi hai, aap meri Monday ko video meeting hum kar lenge, aap bhi us video meeting mein agar reh paoge to zyada better hai, hai na? Dono hi log aap, haan, aap dono hi log agar samajh loge to usme koi dikkat nahi hai. Theek hai, jab aapko samay mile, kabhi kabhar aap dekh lena, nahi to wo to usko handle karenge hi jaisa ki aap bol rahe ho. Bas mera aapse request yahi hai ki jab tak ke liye aaj aapko samay mile, to do-char minute ke liye ek bar apna app open karke apni buyleads consume kariyega sir.
Customer: Main abhi open kiya tha isme.
Executive: Kiya hai? Ek bar check karo, kuch kaam ka buylead abhi hai aapke samne?
Customer: Kaam ka to
Customer: Cone crusher, haan, cone mental ka hai ek.
Executive: Utha lijiye sir.
Executive: 8 minute pehle hi aayi hai, sabse achchi baat ye hai. To abhi wo kisi ne use bhi nahi kari hogi, fresh lead hai matlab.
Customer: Hmm.
Executive: Mini roller conveyer, ye bhi aap hi ka product hai?
Customer: Mini roller conveyer.
Executive: Please check.
Customer: Nahi, mini roller, aisa to kuch mere pe nahi dikhai de raha.
Executive: Sir, 11 minute pehle ki hi lead dikha raha hai, maine abhi aap hi ka lead check kiya hai. To 11 minute pehle ki lead dikha raha hai mere ko.
Customer: Chaliye, main dekh le raha hoon use.
Executive: Aap apne hisab se check kar lo, bilkul koi dikkat nahi hai, lekin please do-teen buyleads abhi ke abhi consume kar lijiyega, theek hai?
Customer: Theek hai, theek hai, theek hai.
Executive: Theek hai.
summary:
Concerns:

- Customer's IndiaMART services are being underutilized.

- Customer states no demand, so not paying attention.

- Customer is not consuming any buyleads.



Resolution:

- Executive offered a video meeting to fix issues.

- Customer will have accountant handle IndiaMART account.

- Executive requested customer to use buyleads daily.



Next Steps: 

- Video meeting scheduled for Monday.



Alert (If Any):

None

@@@Sentiment:

- Angry -> Satisfied



@@@Key Topics:

- buyleads, subscription, account management, video meeting
